column5: Steps from the Horseshoe Bay Towers and resort, this luxury 3 bedroom 2 bath getaway is the perfect spot for a weekend away or a longer vacation . Weather you enjoy jet skiing , tennis , biking , kayaking or just lounging , Horseshoe Bay resort is the epicenter of Lake LBJ activities as well as being a short journey from all the Hill Country has to offer . Remodeled earlier this year by a team of Austin Designers using materials from around world , this property is truly unique .
